mapper.select: select E_name from xhgmnet_talkgroup where TalkgroupID=#{id} limit 1
select count(*) from xhgmnet_talkgroup where TalkgroupID=#{id}

select count(*) from xhgmnet_talkgroup as a LEFT JOIN xhgmnet_msclist as b on a.E_mscId=b.mscId LEFT JOIN xhgmnet_vpn as c on a.E_vpnId=c.vpnId where 1=1
and E_vpnId = #{vpnId}
and talkgroupid like concat('%',#{talkgroupid},'%')
and E_name like concat('%',#{eName},'%')
mapper.sql: id, TalkgroupID, M_TalkgroupAlias, M_SecurityGroup, M_ConsoleTGMGCapabilityProfileAlias, M_TGMGCapabilityProfileAlias, M_TGMGValidSitesProfileAlias, M_PreemptCapable, M_ExtendedBandchannelscanbeassigned, M_TalkgroupRegroupable, M_GroupEnable, E_name, E_alias, E_mscId, E_vpnId, E_said, E_iaid, E_vaid, E_preempt, E_radioType, E_regroupable, E_enabled, E_directDial, saName, iaName, time
mapper.insert: insert into xhgmnet_talkgroup (id, TalkgroupID, M_TalkgroupAlias, M_SecurityGroup, M_ConsoleTGMGCapabilityProfileAlias, M_TGMGCapabilityProfileAlias, M_TGMGValidSitesProfileAlias, M_PreemptCapable, M_ExtendedBandchannelscanbeassigned, M_TalkgroupRegroupable, M_GroupEnable, E_name, E_alias, E_mscId, E_vpnId, E_said, E_iaid, E_vaid, E_preempt, E_radioType, E_regroupable, E_enabled, E_directDial, saName, iaName, time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{talkgroupid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mTalkgroupalias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mSecuritygroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mConsoletgmgcapabilityprofilealias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mTgmgcapabilityprofilealias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mTgmgvalidsitesprofilealias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mPreemptcapable,jdbcType=BIT}, #{mExtendedbandchannelscanbeassigned,jdbcType=BIT}, #{mTalkgroupregroupable,jdbcType=BIT}, #{mGroupenable,jdbcType=BIT}, #{eName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eMscid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eVpnid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{eSaid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eIaid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eVaid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ePreempt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eRadiotype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eRegroupable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eEnabled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eDirectdial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ianame,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update xhgmnet_talkgroup set M_TalkgroupAlias = #{M_TalkgroupAlias}, M_SecurityGroup = #{M_SecurityGroup}, M_ConsoleTGMGCapabilityProfileAlias = #{M_ConsoleTGMGCapabilityProfileAlias}, M_TGMGCapabilityProfileAlias = #{M_TGMGCapabilityProfileAlias}, M_TGMGValidSitesProfileAlias = #{M_TGMGValidSitesProfileAlias}, M_PreemptCapable = #{M_PreemptCapable}, M_ExtendedBandchannelscanbeassigned = #{M_ExtendedBandchannelscanbeassigned}, M_TalkgroupRegroupable = #{M_TalkgroupRegroupable}, M_GroupEnable = #{M_GroupEnable}, E_name = #{E_name}, E_alias = #{E_alias}, E_mscId = #{E_mscId}, E_vpnId = #{E_vpnId}, E_said = #{E_said}, E_iaid = #{E_iaid}, E_vaid = #{E_vaid}, E_preempt = #{E_preempt}, E_radioType = #{E_radioType}, E_regroupable = #{E_regroupable}, E_enabled = #{E_enabled}, E_directDial = #{E_directDial}, saName = #{saName}, iaName = #{iaName}, time = now() where TalkgroupID = #{TalkgroupID}
